titleStmt.title: Good advice to the pulpits deliver'd in a few cautions for the keeping up the reputation of those chairs, and preserving the nation in peace.
titleStmt.author: Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Gother. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
